about.paragraph: I am a self-taught person who lives in Argentina and I dedicate myself to Web and Mobile FrontEnd Development, I cannot call it work because I love what I do, I am constantly training myself, taking courses and learning new technologies with the aim of being able to offer the best service.

appweather.paragraph: IT IS A WEATHER APP DEVELOPED IN REACT JS, IN WHICH IT SHOWS THE WEATHER IN 6 DIFFERENT SCHEDULES, CHANGES ITS BACKGROUND ACCORDING TO THE TIME
